name: userTSP
description:
Each user can have a maximum of two TSP accounts. Use this API to retrieve details of a specific TSP account enabled for a specific user.

**Scopes:** `tsp:read:admin` `tsp:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

userId.description: The user ID or email address of the user. For user-level apps, pass `me` as the value for userId.

$ul: **conference_code**: Conference code: numeric value, length is less than 16.
**id**: The ID of the TSP account.
**leader_pin**: Leader PIN: numeric value, length is less than 16.
